name: Lone Traveler
description:
Lone Traveler - A story about a lone traveler, you have to dig, explore the location, fight monsters in order to survive on the island!
Build a wooden ax or a stone pickaxe and go on an adventure! But be careful, and most importantly, have time to build a shelter before nightfall.

The game is a 2D platformer with adventure elements. Hunt monsters, dig mines, build your own home and more!

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Various crafting items
- Pleasant music
